hero.title: EndoGuard‚Ñ¢ Hormone Intelligence Platform
hero.subtitle: Understand Your Hormone Risk ‚Äî Before Your Next Doctor's Visit
hero.disclaimer1: Designed to support primary care‚Äìled evaluation.
hero.disclaimer2: If you've been told "your labs are normal" but you still don't feel normal ‚Äî start here.

problem.title: The Problem We Solve
problem.p1: Many hormone-related conditions are missed or delayed because early symptoms, environmental exposures, and long-term patterns often do not appear on standard laboratory tests. As a result, patients may struggle to articulate concerns, and clinicians may lack sufficient context during initial evaluations.
problem.p2: EndoGuard‚Ñ¢ provides a preventive, plain-language risk snapshot based on user-reported information and research-backed indicators. The output is designed to help individuals and clinicians decide ‚Äî together ‚Äî whether further evaluation or testing may be appropriate. EndoGuard‚Ñ¢ does not diagnose or predict disease outcomes.

steps.title: Symptoms & History
steps.desc: Share your symptoms, health history, and lifestyle. Our AI analyzes this data against validated hormone dysfunction profiles.

steps.title: Exposure Assessment
steps.desc: We evaluate your daily exposures from products you use‚Äîpersonal care items, food packaging, and household products‚Äîusing FDA and EPA databases.

steps.title: Risk Stratification (Low / Moderate / High)
steps.desc: Our algorithm stratifies your hormone risk into clear tiers based on your symptoms and exposures.

steps.title: Top Drivers Behind Your Risk
steps.desc: Discover the top factors contributing to your hormone risk‚Äîwhether symptoms, EDC exposures, or lifestyle factors.

steps.title: One Clear Next Step
steps.desc: Receive a personalized summary with actionable next steps: lab tests to request, lifestyle changes, and talking points for your doctor.

steps.title: Your Personalized Report (PDF)
steps.desc: Your report includes a clear summary with your risk tier, top drivers, and talking points to discuss with your doctor.

items.title: Personalized Risk Tier (Low / Moderate / High)
items.desc: Clear, easy-to-understand risk stratification based on your unique symptom and exposure profile.

items.title: Top 5 Drivers Behind Your Risk
items.desc: Identify the top factors contributing to your hormone risk‚Äîwhether specific symptoms, EDC exposures, or lifestyle factors.

items.title: One Clear Next Step
items.desc: Personalized recommendations including lab tests to request, lifestyle modifications, and key talking points for your doctor.

items.title: Provider-Ready Summary (print/share)
items.desc: A clinical summary included in your report designed to facilitate informed conversations with your healthcare provider.

items.title: Evidence Transparency (sources listed)
items.desc: Every insight traceable to peer-reviewed research, FDA/EPA databases, and Endocrine Society guidelines‚Äîzero speculation.

items.desc: Full support for English and Spanish, ensuring hormone health guidance is accessible to all.

faq.title: Honest Answers to Hard Questions
faq.subtitle: Because real change starts with real conversations.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.text: Nexus Biomedical Intelligence exists to make healthcare safer, simpler, and more human. We believe transparency builds trust‚Äîand trust saves lives.

q1.question: Will AI replace doctors, pharmacists, or clinicians?
q1.answer: No. AI cannot replace clinical judgment, empathy, or human experience. Nexus platforms are designed to amplify professionals. Our systems automate repetitive checks, cross-reference data instantly, and surface insights‚Äîbut the final decision always belongs to you.

q2.question: What if the AI gets it wrong‚Äîwho is responsible?
q2.answer: You are always in control. Nexus tools are decision support systems, not decision makers. They flag potential issues and recommend actions, but every recommendation includes visible context, source data, and your ability to override or verify it.

q3.question: How do I know my patient data is safe?
q3.answer: We take data security and compliance seriously. All Nexus platforms are built HIPAA-ready with end-to-end encryption and operate within secure, isolated environments. We never sell, share, or train on your private data. You retain full ownership and control.

q4.question: I am not tech-savvy. Will this make my job harder?
q4.answer: Absolutely not. Our design philosophy is clarity over complexity. Every interface is intuitive, clean, and built with clinical workflows in mind. If you can use your EHR, you can use Nexus. Most users master our platforms within a few hours.

q5.question: What if leadership uses AI to cut staff?
q5.answer: Nexus tools are built to reduce burnout, not replace people. Teams that use AI effectively experience fewer medication errors, lower liability, and higher retention. AI creates breathing room for humans to do what they do best‚Äîthink, listen, and care.

q6.question: How transparent is the AI? Can I see how it reaches conclusions?
q6.answer: Yes. Every decision in Nexus comes with an explanation layer. You will see which data sources, evidence levels, and logic paths were used. No black boxes. Just transparent, verifiable reasoning you can trust and audit.

q7.question: What about regulatory approval‚Äîare these systems cleared?
q7.answer: Nexus operates under the framework of Clinical Decision Support (CDS) tools. Our ReguReady platform helps streamline compliance, and every Nexus module is designed with FDA, ISO, and CE standards in mind.

q8.question: How does Nexus integrate with existing systems?
q8.answer: Seamlessly. Nexus connects to leading EHR, pharmacy, and laboratory platforms through secure APIs and FHIR-based interoperability. Whether you use Epic, Cerner, or custom software, integration is fast, secure, and IT-approved.

q9.question: Is AI expensive to implement?
q9.answer: It does not have to be. Nexus was built to democratize access to healthcare innovation. Our tiered pricing model ranges from small-practice subscriptions to enterprise packages, so clinics of any size can start safely and scale sustainably.

q10.question: What happens to empathy when machines enter healthcare?
q10.answer: Empathy grows. When technology handles the repetitive tasks, clinicians can spend more time with their patients‚Äîlistening, connecting, and caring. AI should never replace compassion; it should give you the time and clarity to express it fully.
